<<<<<<< HEAD
No reason to desire new revelations a sermon preach'd at the Cathedral-Church of St. Paul, October 7th, 1700, being the seventh for the year 1700, of the lecture founded by the Honourable Robert Boyle, Esq. / by Ofspring Blackall ... Blackall, Offspring, 1654-1716.
64 p.
Printed by J. Leake, for Walter Kettilby ..., London : 1700.
In two parts, the second with separate t.p.: New revelations would probably be unsuccessful, a sermon preach'd at the Cathedral-Church of St. Paul, November 4th, 1700, being the eighth for the year 1700, of the lecture founded by the Honourable Robert Boyle. London : Printed by J. Leake, for Walter Kettilby, 1700. Reproduction of original in Yale University Library.
=======

64 p.
Printed by J. Leake, for Walter Kettilby ..., London : 1700.
In two parts, the second with separate t.p.: New revelations would probably be unsuccessful, a sermon preach'd at the Cathedral-Church of St. Paul, November 4th, 1700, being the eighth for the year 1700, of the lecture founded by the Honourable Robert Boyle. London : Printed by J. Leake, for Walter Kettilby, 1700. Reproduction of original in Yale University Library.
